channel.title: Need help with Vipscape, Software caused connection abort

item.title: Need help with Vipscape, Software caused connection abort
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

change it back to the normal and search for ( in the client.java )

if (started == 0){
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(1323,1);
addItem(995,100000);
started = 1;
}

and replace with

if (started == 0){ showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(14119,1); addItem(6586,1); addItem(4587,1); addItem(6107,1); addItem(13601,1); addItem(6108,1); addItem(7462,1); addItem(3105,1); addItem(6735,1); addItem(13,100); started = 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Vipscape, Software caused connection abort
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Ok I have changed what the new chars respawn with

public int playerHat = 3749; public int playerCape = 14119; public int playerAmulet = 6586; public int playerWeapon = 4587; public int playerChest = 6107; public int playerShield = 13601; public int playerLegs = 6108; public int playerHands = 7462; public int playerFeet = 3105; public int playerRing = 6735; public int playerArrows = 13;

i HAVE complied and RAN my server and I try and log in and it says
Boots me out i look on run.bat and get this

Software caused connection abort : socket write error [Client-1-Marc323909]: Logout Clienthandler: Client Marc323909 disconnected <localhost>

can someone please correct me as when I log in it quickly boots me out

Read full topic
